solution_line_template: First find the total number of days in 6 weeks: {num_weeks} weeks * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{num_weeks}*{days_per_week}={total_days}>>{total_days} days

Then find the total difference in the number of pages Janet and Belinda read each day: {janet_pages_per_day} pages/day - {belinda_pages_per_day} pages/day = <<{janet_pages_per_day}-{belinda_pages_per_day}={daily_difference}>>{daily_difference} pages/day

Then multiply the daily difference by the number of days to find the total difference in the number of pages they read: {daily_difference} pages/day * {total_days} days = <<{daily_difference}*{total_days}={total_difference}>>{total_difference} pages
